feed.title: Hosted Private Cloud Status - Incident History

entry.title: [RBX2D/SBG1A][Hosted Private Cloud] - Equipment update notification
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT May 7, 06:30 - 21:00 UTC

Apr 7, 21:48 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Hosted Private Cloud offer.

Start time : 07/05/2025 06:30 UTC
End time : 07/05/2025 21:00 UTC
Service impact : You may experience micro cuts during maintenance.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we are rolling out an update for multiple servers.

Thank you for your understanding.

entry.title: [RBX/BHS][Hosted Private Cloud] - Hosts maintenance notification
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Apr 16, 07:00 - 16:00 UTC

Apr 2, 04:27 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Hosted Private Cloud offer.

Start time : 16/04/2025 07:00 UTC
End time : 16/04/2025 16:00 UTC
Service impact : Concerned hosts will be put in maintenance mode during the operation and a vMotion will be performed if it has Virtual machines in it.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our Hosted Private Cloud offer, we will be replacing Hosted Private Cloud's hosts by new ones.
Concerned customers will receive a notification regarding the replacement of their hosts..

Thank you for your understanding.

entry.title: [EU/CA][Hosted Private Cloud] - Host replacement maintenance notification
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Apr 14, 07:00 UTC  -  Apr 18, 15:00 UTC

Apr 2, 21:56 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Hosted Private Cloud offer.

This may temporarily affect the availability of vMotion.

Start time : 14/04/2025 07:00 UTC
End time : 18/04/2025 15:00 UTC
Service impact : Concerned hosts will be put in maintenance mode during the operation and a vMotion will be performed if it has Virtual machines in it.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our Hosted Private Cloud offer, we will be replacing Hosted Private Cloud's hosts by new ones.
Concerned customers will receive a notification regarding the replacement of their hosts.

Thank you for your understanding

entry.title: [RBX8][Hosted Private Cloud] - Host incident notification
entry.content:
Apr 5, 14:23 UTC
Resolved - We would like to inform you that the incident on Hosted Private Cloud offer has now been resolved.

Here is detail for this incident :
Start time : 05/04/2025 11:30 UTC
End time : 05/04/2025 14:01 UTC
Root Cause : This incident was caused by a cooling system issue.

We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident.

Apr 5, 11:46 UTC
Identified - An incident is in progress on our Hosted Private Cloud offer.

Please be aware that this is currently affecting the availability.

Here is detail for this incident :
Start time : 05/04/2025 11:30 UTC
Ongoing actions : Our teams are investigating to determine the origin of the incident and fix it.
Update will be posted as significant progress is made.

Our teams are fully mobilized and we will keep you informed of developments and the resolution of the incident.

We apologize for the inconvenience and thank you for your understanding.

entry.title: [EU/CA][HostedPrivateCloud] - vSphere maintenance notification
entry.content:
Mar 28, 18:11 UTC
Completed - The maintenance was completed, all services are operational.

Mar 21, 17:40 UTC
Update - New end time : 28/03/2025 17:00 UTC
Service impact : vSphere not accessible and hosts will be put in maintenance mode during the operation and a vMotion will be performed if it has Virtual machines in it.

Mar 11, 16:50 UTC
Update - New end time : 21/03/2025 17:00 UTC
Service impact : vSphere not accessible and hosts will be put in maintenance mode during the operation and a vMotion will be performed if it has Virtual machines in it.

Mar 9, 12:14 UTC
Update - Scheduled maintenance is still in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Mar 5, 08:32 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Mar 5, 08:31 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Hosted Private cloud offer.

This may temporarily affect availability.

Start time : 05/03/2025 08:00 UTC
End time : 14/03/2025 17:00 UTC
Service impact : vSphere not accessible and hosts will be put in maintenance mode during the operation and a vMotion will be performed if it has Virtual machines in it.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we are rolling out an upgrade for vSphere offer.
An individual communication will be done to inform customers and you can reschedule through the manager.

Thank you for your understanding.
